item.title: Mbappé vs. Yamal is the new Ronaldo vs. Messi -- so which Clasico star is better?
item.description: Not since Messi vs. Ronaldo has the Barcelona-Real Madrid rivalry given us a matchup like Yamal vs. Mbappe. So, which superstar would you rather have?

item.title: Madrid vs. Barça head-to-head, form, key clashes, predictions, odds
item.description: When Real Madrid and Barcelona face off, there's nothing bigger happening anywhere in the soccer world.

item.title: Vitello: 'Selfish' but 'right' call to manage Giants
item.description: Tony Vitello told reporters he leaned on "anyone and everyone" before making the decision to leave the Tennessee baseball program and manage the Giant...

item.title: How Week 9 could start to bring order to the college football season
item.description: Can LSU get on track? Which unbeatens could go down? And how does the ACC clean itself up?

item.title: Week 9 preview: Conference title contenders, key matchups and more
item.description: There's not a conference in the country that has a clear-cut front-runner.
